directions: In a small saucepan, mix together tomatoes, zucchini, salsa, water, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Mix in bell peppers if desired. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce to a simmer. Simmer 3 to 4 minutes, stirring frequently.
ingredients: 2 plum tomatoes, halved and cut into 1/4 inch slices
title: Tomato and Zucchini Melange
